msg: Removed dead ftp mirrors, these were invalid by both a dns lookup and an attempt to ftp into them

author: slive
msg: Definition: Dead mirror = any http mirror that has not picked up
httpd-2.0.40 a week after its release, and any mirror that is
inaccessible to me on two consecutive tries several days apart.
- I have not tested the ftp mirrors, but I have removed ftp mirrors
that are parallel to dead http mirrors
in the mirrors listing as being innaccessible from outside of
Australia.  That makes me rather uncomfortable, but I have left it
for now.  If any Aussies want to test it for me, that would be
